title: 5 teens shot in drive-by shooting in Chicago
content:
CHICAGO (AP) — A gunman firing from a minivan has shot and wounded five teenagers in Chicago.
The shooting took place Monday night in the Englewood neighborhood.
Three girls and two boys were hospitalized. All are 16 or 17 years old.
Chicago police say they were in stable condition as of late Monday night.
No suspects were in custody as of Tuesday morning and police say the motive remains unclear.
